data.name: Smogon Noir
data.description: The complete Smogon dark theme experience is back, and looks better than ever! This theme re-stylizes everything Smogon (including the Forums, Articles, and Dex!) and has changed the color of almost every element so it all feels natural. Blacks, grays, and red accents are the basis of this theme. Please direct all feedback here: http://www.smogon.com/forums/threads/smogon-noir-a-complete-dark-theme-for-smogon.3626417/

Complete dark style for Elakiri. In active development, feel free to use the source code for any customized modification.
Please do not use for commercial purposes.
